# [Interview #1162: Shadows of Self-San Jose, Entry #8](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1162#8)

#### Question

How did Marsh survive for so many years?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Compounding Atium. He got a pouch of it that was featured in an earlier scene.
